home.loading_stats_achievements_failed: Failed to load achievements and statistics.

observation_note.title: Enter a tree observation
observation_note.text: It's easy to do and will not take you too long.

trees_changed_alert.title: Attention!
trees_changed_alert.text: We recently changed some trees and their species, as well as their location. Please be careful when searching by number (#x)!

error_loading.text: Could not load tree data. Please try again later.

step1.tree_search_placeholder: Enter Country, City, Street, Species or ID...
step1.title: Your tree
step1.map_error_text: Could not load map data. Please choose a tree below manually.

step2.nothing_to_observe: There is nothing to observe set up for this tree. Should you suspect a mistake, please contact a system administrator.

help.title: Check the following objects and tick the most fitting image for each

step3.title: Documentation
step3.upload_photo_placeholder: Choose a photo of the tree

help.description: You must enter your name and the naes of everyone observing with you and can optionally upload a picture of the tree if you want and add additional remarks.

step3.photo_type_invalid: The photo must be of type PNG or JPEG.
step3.photo_size_invalid: The photo must not be larger than 5 MB.

status.duplicate: There is already an observation at the given time.
status.generic: Please try submitting again in a few moments. If you refresh the page, your observation data is lost.

success.title: Success
success.text: Your observation has been successfully submitted.

error.text: We could not load the tree list, please try again.

error.title: Error
error.text: We could not load the given tree, please go back and try again.

login.heading: Your Project-Account
login.status_connection_insecure: You may not log in using an insecure connection
login.status_bad_credentials: Username and password were not recognized
login.status_expired: Your login expired, please log in again
login.status_force_credentials_confirm: Please confirm your password to access the requested page
login.status_not_authenticated: Please log in to view this page
login.status_insufficient_permissions: You are not allowed to access the requested page
login.description: Your personal project account enables you to enter phenology observations, access project-related news and much more.
login.disclaimer:
We don't store any personal data except those needed for scientific research clearly marked to be sent off for submission.
No automated E-Mails are sent out at any time to any user.
By logging in you agree to store your personal login information inside your browser.
login.reset_info:
Your new password must meet these requirements:
  • Contains at least 1 lowercase letter (a-z)
  • Contains at least 1 UPPERCASE letter (A-Z)
  • Contains at least 1 number (0-9)
  • Contains at least 1 symbol (!ยง$%&/()=?"'+#<>,..-*~)
  • Is at least 10 characters long
login.username_change_info:
Your new username must meet these requirements:
  • Is at least 5 characters long
  • Is different to your current username
  • Does not already exist
login.username_change_failed: Your username could not be changed
login.failed_attempts_info: Your account will be locked for 5 minutes after 10 failed login attempts.
login.change_password_failed: Your password could not be changed, check if your old password is correct
login.change_password_failed_nooldpw: Your password could not be changed, please contact an admin
